Comment (context for translators): Used in input settings when showing bindings for Gamepad (controller)
Used in input settings when showing bindings for Keyboard
Used in input settings when showing bindings for Mouse
Text on a button that would abort some ongoing operation. It is different from "cancel" since something can be cancelled before it starts, but aborting implies that operation has already begun.

Translation: Ekspedisi dibatalkan. Anak kapal {0} mati sebelum memasuki pesawat ulang-alik..
Comment (context for translators): {0} will be replaced with a name

Translation: Ekspedisi dibatalkan. Kita terlalu jauh daripada sasaran {0}.
Comment (context for translators): {0} will be replaced with a destination name (i.e. planet name)
"About" menu item name
"Mods" in this context is game modifications, or expansions.

Translation: Duit boleh dilombong selepas penaiktarafan perlombongan mata wang telah dipasang dalam Komputer Kapal atau alat perlombongan yang sesuai. Duit juga boleh dijana dengan berniaga barang dagang atau saham.

Comment (context for translators): AI here is short for Artificial Intelligence. Rogue AI is something like Skynet in Terminator movie, or the AI that enslaved humans in The Elysium movie.
Asimov is Isaac Asimov, a famous sci-fi writer who created the "three laws of robotics"
This is past tense of verb "to breach", meaning: make a gap in and break through (a wall, barrier, or defence).

Translation: Diceroboh oleh lanun melalui Kapsul Penembus
Comment (context for translators): "boarded" as in "the act of passengers and crew getting aboard a ship or aircraft". Raiders are a pirates, "Breach Capsule" is a small pirate space ship that attaches to your ship and breaches through the hull to attack you.
"joy ride" is an English idiom for "a fast and dangerous ride in a stolen vehicle."
There are viral videos on youtube showing cats riding roombas (cleaning robots), example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SajTWY9a0e0

Translation: Menetapkan koloni manusia atas planet yang boleh didiami

Comment (context for translators): this is a reference to "The Terminator" movie. Scene: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tYc2jQaM8gM
"lose" here means getting your ship computer destroyed

Translation: Mengambil seekor Perangkak dalam perjalanan pulang daripada ekspedisi perlombongan
Pasang penaiktarafan perlombongan dalam Komputer Kapal

Comment (context for translators): {0} is a date, like 2022-10-12

Translation: Ini Bukan Di Sini Sebelum Ini
Jumpa sebiji telur di atas kapal

Comment (context for translators): this refers to finally discovering a terraformable planet after a long search

Translation: Membiarkan Perangkak untuk menetas dalam seorang kolonis

Comment (context for translators): short for "all in one piece" idiom, which means "Uninjured or unharmed; fully intact.". Examples of idiom use: We are lucky to have walked away from that car accident all in one piece. I made sure to pack the heirloom carefully so that it would still be all in one piece when it reached my daughter.

Translation: Gabung bahagian-bahagian kapal hancur mejadi satu
Jual saham dengan $100,000 kerugian di Pasaran Saham
Cipta lautan dan sungai atas sebuah planet
Cipta permukaan dan benua atas sebuah planet

Comment (context for translators): this is a name for a fictional device that allows ripping the fabric of space-time and traveling though a tunnel between two black holes. "Void" here is as in "emptiness, empty space"
This is about the worker, as in "worker is moving to position"
This is about the worker, as in "worker is moving to position"
This is about the worker, as in "worker is moving to position"

Translation: Menyelamat seseorang yang tersandar di angkasa

Comment (context for translators): Verb, when someone is expressing anger, etc
Opposite of Inactive or Disabled. Appears on device buttons that can switch the state, or on labels that display that device is active (operational, running)

Translation: Arahan aktif diberikan terus oleh alatan. Had aktif order yang boleh diberikan adalah berdasarkan jumlah Memori dalam Komputer Kapal yang sedia ada. Kalau bilangan arahan yang diberikan melebihi had arahan Kapal Komputer, anda kena tunggu untuk bilangan arahan aktif untuk turun sebelum memberikan arahan baru.
Pekerja dialih perhatian oleh sebuah Penggera Kecemasan
Makhluk terbang gagal mencari jalan ke lokasi sasaran. Pastikan pintu telah dihidupkan and tidak dikunci
Version: pastikan juga jika perkerja tidak diperangkap oleh dinding.

Translation: Makhluk atas darat gagal mencari jalan ke lokasi sasaran.Pastikan pintu telah dihidupkan and tidak dikunci
Version: pastikan juga jika perkerja tidak diperangkap oleh dinding.

Translation: Kerja memelukan kemahiran terbang, tetapi tiada perkerja yang boleh terbang.
Pekerja ada 0 keutamaan untuk pekerjaan jenis ini.
Tiada perkerja boleh mencapai tahap kepakaran yang cukup tinggi untuk melepasi tahap kepakaran yang diperlukan untuk melakukan kerja ini.
Tiada sesiapa mempunyai Keparakan Diperlukan. Bina sebuah Bilik ML untuk melatih pekerja untuk melakukan pekerjaan mudah dengan menggunakan kepakaran yang sama.
Baris gilir untuk alat pemproses penuh
Dibatalkan kerana pekerja diserang sesuatu yang menurunkan HP.
Gagal untuk sampai ke lokasi bahan
Pekerja terbang tidak boleh sampai ke lokasi bahan. Pastikan pekerja tiada halangan untuk bergerak ke lokasi bahan.
Pekerja atas darat tidak boleh sampai ke lokasi bahan. Pastikan pekerja tiada halangan untuk bergerak ke lokasi bahan.
Pekerja yang boleh melakukan kerja ini tidak mempunyai kawasan pekerjaan yang selamat. Kemungkinan besar hanya manusia yang boleh melakukan kerja tersebut.

Comment (context for translators): For now only used in switching between "Advanced" and "Basic" life support system function

Translation:
Koloni manusia anda telah menetap di {0}. {1} hari diambil untuk mencari dan membentuk planet tersebut. {2} kolonis telah memutuskan untuk duduk atas kapal.

Anda boleh meneruskan meneroka Alam Semesta selama mana yang anda mahu.
Comment (context for translators): {0} is planet name, {1} is a number (of days), {2} is a number (of colonists)
When you open "airtightness" overlay, hovering any location with the mouse will show a tooltip showing "Airtightness at [123:12]: 99%". {0} variable is coordinate, {1} is percentage.
Used in stock market history range choice (1 day, 1 week, 1 month, 1 year, all time)
Used in showing mood boost reason for introverted people when they are alone, not in a crowd
For video setting that controls how much ambient light will there be, i.e. how dark things will get if there are no lamps installed. Last change was "Ambient Color" => "Ambient Light"
Ambient light option when everything will be very bright
Darkest ambient light option, that will keep things very dark unless there are light sources
Somewhat dark ambient light option that still has good visibility
Medium ambient light option, between bright and dark

Translation: Benda ini ada anomali yang boleh dijumpai ketika ekspedisi. Ia mungkin bahaya!

Comment (context for translators): {0} will be replaced with who is arriving (i.e Arriving: Ore trader). For now only used for notifying about arriving merchants.

Translation: Aksi ini akan melanggar Hukum Robotik Pertama Asimov. Sebuah robot tidak boleh membahayakan manusia secara langsung, atau melalui kelalaian, Aksi dibatalkan,
Aksi ini akan melanggar Hukum Robotik Ketiga Asimov. Sebuah robot mesti melindungi nyawa sendiri selagi perlindungan tersebut tidak bercanggah dengan Hukum Pertame atau Kedua. Aksi dibatalkan.

Comment (context for translators):
1. This is a text in UI of the Crafting Station/Assembler/Fabricator.
It combined with the name of the device which is produced right now (like "Assembling Microchip")
2. This is a tooltip text, appearing when you hover a mouse over Crafting Station/Assembler/Fabricator.
It combined with the state of production process in percents (like "Assembling 85%")

Translation: Berita baik. Kita telah berjaya mengelak perlanggaran asteroid!
Orang ini menganggap katil ini sebagai harta benda mereka. Dia akan cuba tidur atas katil tersebut sekiranya mampu..
Haiwan peliharaan ini menganggap katil ini sebagai harta benda ia. Ia akan cuba tidur atas katil tersebut sekiranya mampu.

Comment (context for translators): For showing what gender the being is attracted to (i.e. "Attracted To -> Female")

Translation: If enabled, ambience sources (various device sounds, engine noise, etc.) will sound more muffled at a distance.
If enabled, sound effects (beeps, explosions, etc.) will sound more muffled at a distance.
Adjusts the periods of silence in between the music tracks.
If enabled, music will sound more muffled when you zoom in close.

Comment (context for translators): short for "Automatic", could be used on a narrow button that toggles between automatic and some other (i.e. manual) setting

Translation: If Auto Clean is enabled, workers will automatically clean this device when it gets dirty.
Workers will automatically haul compatible items to this facility unless Auto Haul is disabled in the device configuration.
This is the maximum amount of fuel that workers will put into the device. The Refill task will be automatically created when fuel drops below 50% of the auto refill amount.

Would you like to automatically report game crashes and errors to the developer?

It is very important to have these reports in order to fix problems and issues with the game, so please consider accepting this.

More details at https://stardeusgame.com/privacy/

If enabled, it will send in-game errors, exceptions, and crashes to the developer. Please consider leaving this enabled, if you would like the game to become better. Find out more about what is being sent at stardeusgame.com/privacy/
Will automatically create a task to clean the panel when dust level reaches this value
Screen resolution changed. Auto scaling the UI because previous value was out of valid range.

Comment (context for translators): Tells how many items of that type are owned by the player. {0} is a number
Opposite of "Advanced". For now only used in life support option choice (Advanced / Basic)
